summary: Venezuela, Guatemala, Cuba, Chile, Salvador, Bolivia: people's struggle for democracy versus US imperialism in Latin America since the 1950s, backing coups and supporting dictatorships.
cast: John Pilger|Philip Agee|Salvador Allende|George Bush|George W. Bush|Fidel Castro|Hugo Chávez|Duane Clarridge|Allen Dulles|John Foster Dulles|Ari Fleischer|Richard Helms|E. Howard Hunt|Henry Kissinger|Richard Nixon|Jose Serrano|Jacobo Árbenz
director: Directors: Chris Martin, John Pilger | 1 more credit »
title: La guerra contra la democracia
